channel.title: [PI]What's wrong with this code? [PI]

item.title: [PI]What's wrong with this code? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @PIEBAR2FAR PIEBAR2FAR
item.description:
@PIEBAR2FAR wrote:

case ****:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(!!!!, 1);
break;

**** npc id !!! dialogueid
That goes in action handler under a break; under firstclick npc

case !!!!:
sendNpcChat1("Want to see my shop?", c.talkingNpc, "Npc Name");
c.nextChat = @@@@;
break;

case @@@@:
sendOption2("Yes", "No");
dialogueAction = $$$$;
break;

That goes in your dialogueHandler class,
$$$$ number you want to use for dialogue action
@@@@ dialogue number put in both occurences
!!! dialogue id from before

case 9157:
if (c.dialogueAction == $$$$) {
c.getShops().openShop(shopid);
}

$$$$ dialogueaction from before

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]What's wrong with this code? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @CodeBest CodeBest
item.description:
@CodeBest wrote:

First off, why do you have brackets there? You dont need brackets if you only have one line of code.

second, there is nothing wrong with it apart from that ^ you didnt post your error so we cant help you

item.title: [PI]What's wrong with this code? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @rawrawr123 rawrawr123
item.description:
@rawrawr123 wrote:

I’m trying to create a dialogue with an npc like this for example:
“want to see my shop?”

“yes”, “no”

I’ve narrowed it down, and I think that it’s here in my ClickingButtons file

under case 9157 I have:

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 15) { c.getShops().openShop(19); }

under case 9158 I have:

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 15) { c.getPA().removeAllWindows(); }
If i’m wrong please tell me which code you need to see and i’ll be quick to reply, any help is appreciated thanks!

Read full topic
